title: Leading AI companies' safety practices fall short, says new report
description: As leading artificial intelligence companies release increasingly capable AI systems, a new report is sounding the alarm about their safety practices.
content:
As leading artificial intelligence companies release increasingly capable AI systems, a new report is sounding the alarm about what it says are some of those companies lagging safety practices.
